H0.text: Which was the only eastern bloc country to participate in the 1984 LA Olympics. Poland

H1.text: Which was the only eastern bloc country to participate in the 1984 LA Olympics. Hungary

H2.text: Which was the only eastern bloc country to participate in the 1984 LA Olympics. Czechoslovakia

H3.text: Which was the only eastern bloc country to participate in the 1984 LA Olympics. ROU

A4.text: Romania was the only Soviet-aligned state that opted to attend the Games.

A5.text: Czechoslovakia was part of the Soviet-led boycott of the 1984 Summer Olympics.
